cleaned_text: Welcome to Clove Pharmacy COMMITTED TO CARE STATEN ISLAND, NY PHARMACY | HEALTH | BEAUTY Clove Pharmacy is dedicated to bringing you the higest quality pharmacy and health care products on Staten Island, NY. Visit us today at the corner of Clove Rd. and Victory Blvd. About Clove Pharmacy Your Local Family Pharmacy At Clove Pharmacy we strive to be your health experts. We are committed to your families care. Our pharmacy is locally owned and operated, we live right here on Staten Island. We encourage you and your family to stop by our pharmacy at the corner of Clove Rd and Victory Blvd across from Dunkin' Donuts Ontime pharmacy services Professional expert staff Convenient location What We Offer Our Services At Clove Pharmacy we offer a variety of services to our patients. Take a look at the services listed below and let us know how we can help you and your family. Diabetic Screenings At Clove Pharmacy we offer Diabetic Screenings for our patients. We want you to stay on top of your health. Free Delivery Can't come to us? No problem, let us come to you. We offer free delivery anywhere on Staten Island. Multilingual Pharmacy Clove Pharmacy can speak your language. We understand not all of our patients use English as their primary language. Our staff is here to assist you no matter the language you speak. More Choices Beauty is a brush of perfection At Clove Pharmacy we offer a wide variety of beauty products including shower products, hair products, facial products and more. We invite you to stop and see our beauty selection for our patients. Beauty Products Create your style with us and discover the beauty within. We offer professional and custom makeup application by appointment for any occasion. We can accommodate proms, weddings, engagements - any special event. We also carry a variety of beauty products. Quality body scrubs, face masks, hair products and bath salts are just some items we stock. Pamper your body from head to toe. When you look good, you feel good. Let us help you treat yourself! Armoatherapy Aromatherapy is a time-honored tradition using essential oils extracted from 100% pure plant sources such as flowers, fruits, herbs and spices. We carry a wide variety of oils, on the go roll-ons, spray mists and diffusers. We have calming, rejuvenating, cleansing, meditative, uplifting oils and many more. Our products only contain pure ingredients, ensuring you the safest and most effective aromatherapy experience. What We Offer Our Beauty Products Clove Pharmacy tailors to a unique set of clients for our beauty product line. We ensure all of our clients reach a unique style and touch desired.
